comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
B-24J 42-73324 FLYING CLOUD flew with the 14AF 308BG 374BS. It went MIA 24-Jun-1944 on a bombing mission to Hankow (MACR 6135).
Pilot             1st Lt Henry F. Portyrata 
Copilot         2nd Lt James F. Detzel 
Navigator     2nd Lt William H. Strauch 
Bombardier  1st Lt Carroll R. Maddox 
Engineer       T/Sgt Harold G. Baily 
Gunner         S/Sgt Horace J. Miller
